Create a co-occurrence vector (cove)

Source: R/lop_cove.R
lop_cove.Rd

Converts a co-occurrence matrix (coma) to a co-occurrence vector (cove)

lop_cove(x, ordered, normalization)

# S3 method for coma
lop_cove(x, ordered = TRUE, normalization = "none")

Arguments

x

A matrix - an output of the lop_coma() function
ordered

The type of pairs considered. Either "ordered" (TRUE) or "unordered" (FALSE). The default is TRUE.
normalization

Should the output vector be normalized? Either "none" or "pdf". The "pdf" option normalizes a vector to sum to one. The default is "none".

Value

A co-occurrence vector

Examples

library(comat)
library(raster)
data(raster_x, package = "comat")
raster_x = raster(raster_x)
plot(raster_x)

com = lop_coma(raster_x)
com
#> # A tibble: 1 x 5
#>      id   row   col na_prop matrix           
#> * <int> <int> <int>   <dbl> <list>           
#> 1     1     1     1       0 <int[,3] [3 × 3]>

cov = lop_cove(com)
cov
#> # A tibble: 1 x 5
#>      id   row   col na_prop vector   
#> * <int> <int> <int>   <dbl> <list>   
#> 1     1     1     1       0 <dbl [9]>
